attributes.action: place a below 2% pay rise for a three year period for ALL Ministers (afterall if it's good enough for the Public Sector Workers it should be good enough for our Government).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Gordon Brown and his Government are telling millions of Nurses, Civil Servants, Firemen, Prison Officers and Police to pull their belts in for the good of the country and our economy then they should take the lead and take the lowest pay deal of all.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPrenumeration/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MP-Pay-Freeze/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nopayrise/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/savecash/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Pay-rises/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/salaryMP/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fairgovern/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPsPayRise2008/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPpayrises/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FreezeMPpay/
		http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mppayrise/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
